item.description:
Joan has opened her home for a Knitting Bunch.

"I'd like to make some quiches and fruit salad and Mimosas. Folks should bring knitting, and can bring any food type offerings they'd like - but not mandatory, since if everyone brings something, we'll have way too much!. I have some parking concerns since there is so much snow! There is guest parking in immediate vicinity for 4 cars, and more scattered around the development. I think people sometimes park on side of road around circle, but that maybe hard now - maybe we can see how it is when we get closer. If attendance is large, we might have to ask people to car pool...

10 am or later. Not sure how many go to church, etc. unitl whenever.. "
item.name: Sunday Brunch at Joans! -February 22
